channel.title: CVE Feed for Link Whisper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Link Whisper -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47852|2023-12-20T14:49:43.676Z -- link%20whisper -- link%20whisper%20free
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Link Whisper Link Whisper Free.This issue affects Link Whisper Free: from n/a through 0.6.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-27992|2024-06-04T17:46:54.948Z -- link%20whisper -- link%20whisper%20free
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Link Whisper Link Whisper Free allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Link Whisper Free: from n/a through 0.6.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31934|2024-04-11T12:19:10.041Z -- link%20whisper -- link%20whisper%20free
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Link Whisper Link Whisper Free.This issue affects Link Whisper Free: from n/a through 0.6.9.
